programme.title: Biden and Kinnock
programme.short_synopsis: Joe Biden's alleged plagiarism of a speech by Neil Kinnock in 1987.
programme.medium_synopsis: Senator Joe Biden's echoing of a speech by Neil Kinnock, the effect on his presidential campaign in 1987, and the danger of a politician speaking out of turn in the digital age.
